title: SASTRA University; Offering World Class Education

content: SASTRA is a Deemed University offering various undergraduate graduate programs besides Ph D in Science Engineering Law Management Education and Arts The Srinivasa Ramanujan Centre an off campus centre of SASTRA at Kumbakonam was established in the ye chars
